title: Bug: pm2日志堆积
body:
### 描述问题

pm2日志**文件体积**随时间推移越来越大

### 复现步骤

暂无


### 预期行为

分割或者自动销毁指定天数的日志

### 实际行为

pm2_out.log文件越来越大

### 操作系统

any

### Node.js 版本

any

### 项目版本

1.7.8

### 附加信息

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/4fd8c93b-aae0-4560-ac22-af3fac09a7e4)

title: build(deps-dev): bump vite from 6.1.1 to 6.1.2

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

labels.name: javascript
labels.description: Pull requests that update javascript code

body:
Bumps [vite](https://github.com/vitejs/vite/tree/HEAD/packages/vite) from 6.1.1 to 6.1.2.
Release notes

Sourced from vite's releases.

v6.1.2

Please refer to CHANGELOG.md for details.

Changelog

Sourced from vite's changelog.

6.1.2 (2025-03-24)

  • fix: fs raw query with query separators (#19702) (80381c3), closes #19702
Commits
  • 0044d54 release: v6.1.2
  • 80381c3 fix: fs raw query with query separators (#19702)
  • 021443c release: v6.1.1
  • ccac73d fix(deps): update all non-major dependencies (#19440)
  • 0c85464 refactor: remove custom .jxl mime (#19457)
  • e7ba55e fix: ensure .[cm]?[tj]sx? static assets are JS mime (#19453)
  • edc65ea fix(worker): fix web worker type detection (#19462)
  • 60456a5 fix(deps): update all non-major dependencies (#19392)
  • 0ff556a feat: add support for injecting debug IDs (#18763)
  • 973283b fix: ignore *.ipv4 address in cert (#19416)
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=vite&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=6.1.1&new-version=6.1.2)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) You can disable automated security fix PRs for this repo from the [Security Alerts page](https://github.com/KarinJS/Karin/network/alerts).
好的，这是翻译成中文的 pull request 总结： ## Sourcery 总结 构建： - 将 vite 依赖从 6.1.1 版本更新到 6.1.2 版本。
Original summary in English ## Summary by Sourcery Build: - Updates the vite dependency from version 6.1.1 to 6.1.2.

title: Bug: 端口占用
body:
### 描述问题

启动后Karin会检测后台是否存在karin进程，存在则发送exit关闭命令，但是再关闭后，还是会提示端口占用

### 复现步骤

1. 略

### 预期行为

再关闭进程后，应当不会再占用端口，并且当前karin可以正常使用这个端口

### 实际行为

karin报错端口占用

### 操作系统

debian 11.2

### Node.js 版本

20.18.0

### 项目版本

1.7.6

### 附加信息

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/d8217b49-67a1-4c49-8eac-6cf809cc7cd5)
